ai-kv2.3:1.1_0: there are perfected ones for a perfected one.
ai-kv2.3:1.3_0: There is a perfected one, there is doubt that is the hindrance of doubt, and doubt.
ai-kv2.3:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.3:2.1_0: There is no doubt that has no doubt about the origin of doubt, there is no doubt about the hindrance of doubt.
ai-kv2.3:3.1_0: There is an ordinary person who has doubt, there is doubt in them, the hindrance of doubt that doubt is the hindrance of doubt.
ai-kv2.3:3.3_0: There is doubt, there is doubt in them, there is doubt about the origin of doubt that state of doubt.
ai-kv2.3:3.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.3:4.1_0: There is no doubt that there is no doubt about the origin of doubt, there is no doubt about the hindrance of doubt.
ai-kv2.3:4.3_0: There is an ordinary person who has no doubt, there is no doubt about the origin of doubt, there is no doubt about the hindrance of doubt.
ai-kv2.3:4.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.3:5.1_0: there are perfected ones for a perfected one.
ai-kv2.3:5.3_0: There is doubt in the Saṅgha, uncertainty, and uncertainty regarding the Teacher, the teaching, the Saṅgha, the training, and immersion that doubt in the past, the future.
ai-kv2.3:5.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv2.3:6.1_0: You have no doubts about the teaching ...
ai-kv2.3:6.1_1: any doubt regarding the right way:
ai-kv2.3:6.3_0: If a perfected one has no doubt in the teaching ...
ai-kv2.3:6.3_1: When you have no such a thing, you should say that about the rules of points.
ai-kv2.3:7.1_0: there is doubt in them, there is doubt in them.

ai-kv2.3:7.3_0: there is a perfected one, there are doubting about the teaching ...

ai-kv2.3:7.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;

ai-kv2.3:9.1_0: there are perfected ones for a perfected one.
ai-kv2.3:9.3_0: Does a perfected one haven’t given up greed, hate, and delusion—so they’re unable to arise in the future?
ai-kv2.3:9.5_0: Even if a perfected one has given up greed, repulsion, views, doubt, conceit, desire to be reborn, and ignorance is unable to arise in the future.
ai-kv2.3:10.1_0: there are perfected ones for a perfected one.
ai-kv2.3:10.9_0: When there is no conscience and prudence ...
ai-kv2.3:10.11_0: is not free from greed, hate, and delusion. ...
ai-kv2.3:10.14_0: trembled, free of greed, hate, and delusion. ...
ai-kv2.3:10.15_0: Seeking the truth, he should be spoken to.
ai-kv2.3:11.1_0: there are perfected ones for a perfected one.
ai-kv2.3:11.2_0: When a perfected one has a fully awakened Buddha, there is no doubt in the teaching of others.
ai-kv2.3:11.3_0: Who is skilled in the teaching:
ai-kv2.3:11.5_0: When a perfected one has a fully awakened Buddha, there is doubting.
ai-kv2.3:11.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.3:12.1_0: the one who has no doubts others,
ai-kv2.3:12.3_0: Who has no doubt about the teachings,
ai-kv2.3:12.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.3:13.1_0: Who has given up greed, hate, and delusion, there is doubting.
ai-kv2.3:13.3_0: But a perfected one has given up greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-kv2.3:13.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.3:14.8_0: When there is no conscience and prudence ...
ai-kv2.3:14.10_0: They are skilled in the teaching, free of greed, hate, and delusion. ...
ai-kv2.3:14.11_0: there is something to be realized, there is doubt in him,
ai-kv2.3:14.13_0: They’re skilled in the teaching because they’re free of greed, hate, and delusion. ...
ai-kv2.3:14.14_0: there is something to be realized, there is doubt in him,
ai-kv2.3:14.15_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.3:14.16_0: ‘It is unskillful, that a perfected one has given up greed, there is no doubt you.’
ai-kv2.3:14.18_0: Who has given up greed, hate, and delusion subsides for him: there is no doubting.
ai-kv2.3:14.19_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.3:15.8_0: When there is no conscience and prudence ...
ai-kv2.3:15.10_0: They’re skilled in the teaching because they’re free of greed, hate, and delusion. ...
ai-kv2.3:15.11_0: you must realize the truth, there is no doubting about it.
ai-kv2.3:15.13_0: They are skilled in the teaching, free of greed, hate, and delusion. ...
ai-kv2.3:15.14_0: you must realize the truth, there is no doubting about it.
ai-kv2.3:15.15_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.3:16.1_0: there are perfected ones for a perfected one.
ai-kv2.3:16.4_0: “Mendicants, I say that the ending of defilements is for one who knows and sees, not for one who does not know or see.
ai-kv2.3:16.5_0: For one who knows and sees what?
ai-kv2.3:16.8_0: The ending of the defilements is for one who knows and sees this.”
ai-kv2.3:17.1_0: there are perfected ones for a perfected one.
ai-kv2.3:17.4_0: “Mendicants, I say that the ending of defilements is for one who knows and sees, not for one who does not know or see.
ai-kv2.3:17.5_0: For one who knows and sees what?
ai-kv2.3:17.7_0: ‘This is the practice that leads to the cessation of defilements.’
ai-kv2.3:17.8_0: The ending of the defilements is for one who knows and sees this.”
ai-kv2.3:18.1_0: there are perfected ones for a perfected one.
ai-kv2.3:18.4_0: “Mendicants, without directly knowing and completely understanding the all, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.
ai-kv2.3:18.5_0: By directly knowing and completely understanding the all, having dispassion for it and giving it up, you can end suffering.”
ai-kv2.3:19.1_0: there are perfected ones for a perfected one.
ai-kv2.3:19.5_0: and unable to perform the six grave crimes.”
ai-kv2.3:20.1_0: there are perfected ones for a perfected one.
ai-kv2.3:20.4_0: “Mendicants, when a noble disciple stains the stainless, immaculate vision of the Truth:
ai-kv2.3:20.5_0: ‘Everything that has a beginning has an end.’ They give up the three fetters.
ai-kv2.3:20.6_0: Identity view, doubt, misapprehension of precepts and observances.”
ai-kv2.3:21.1_0: there are perfected ones for a perfected one.
ai-kv2.3:22.4_0: since he knows (the nature of) things and its cause.
ai-kv2.3:23.1_0: When (the nature of) things becomes really manifest
ai-kv2.3:23.4_0: Since he’s understood the end of the conditions.
ai-kv2.3:24.1_0: When (the nature of) things becomes really manifest
ai-kv2.3:24.4_0: Like the sun shining in the sky,
ai-kv2.3:25.1_0: Whatever doubts there are (about) here or hereafter,
ai-kv2.3:25.2_0: about one’s own experiences or those of another:
ai-kv2.3:25.3_0: The meditators give up all these,
ai-kv2.3:25.4_0: The ardent ones living the spiritual life
ai-kv2.3:26.1_0: Those who have gone beyond doubt,
ai-kv2.3:26.4_0: which is given to them is very fruitful.
ai-kv2.3:27.1_0: The teaching’s explained in such a way
ai-kv2.3:27.2_0: that not a single disciple doubts it.
ai-kv2.3:27.3_0: Wealth is unshaken, the lord of men,
ai-kv2.3:27.4_0: who has crossed the flood and cut off doubt.”
ai-kv2.3:29.4_0: Isn’t without a woman or a man of such a mass of horses, will get rid of doubts, uncertainty, or doubts about the path dogs, buys, and uncertains.
ai-kv2.3:29.6_0: If that woman is struck by an embryo’s head, she would have no doubts or uncertainty about the road.
ai-kv2.3:30.1_0: She’s not even doubting or uncertainty of the mass of a woman, she’s doubting or uncertainty about the mark of a woman. She’s not looking down on her way.
ai-kv2.3:30.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.3:30.5_0: The discussion on doubt is finished.
